Structs/Event.html#/s:12PredictionIO5Eve.abstract: The entity ID. entityType-entityID becomes the unique identifier

Structs/Event.html.name: Event
Structs/Event.html.abstract: The Event struct represents an event dictionary in the REST API

Structs/CreateEventResponse.html.name: CreateEventResponse

Structs/CreateBatchEventsResponse.html.name: CreateBatchEventsResponse
Structs/CreateBatchEventsResponse.html.abstract: Represents the response of a creating batch events request.

Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.name: notFound
Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.abstract: Resource not found. The server returns 404 status code.

Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.name: badRequest
Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.abstract: Bad request e.g. invalid JSON or invalid date format.

Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.name: unknownResponse
Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.abstract: Unknown response format returned by the server.

Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.name: unknownStatusCode
Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.abstract: Unknown status code returned by the server.

Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.name: failed
Enums/PIOError/RequestFailureReason.html.abstract: Failure due to network or any other error.

Enums/PIOError/InvalidEventReason.html#/.name: invalidJSONProperties
Enums/PIOError/InvalidEventReason.html#/.abstract: The Event.properties is not a valid JSON dictionary.

Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.name: invalidURL
Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.abstract: Returned when failing to convert a string and optionally a query params

Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.name: invalidEvent
Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.abstract: Returned when an event is found invalid

Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.name: failedRequest
Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.abstract: Returned when a request fails. It could be due to network error, backend error

Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.name: failedSerialization
Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.abstract: Returned when failing to serialize an object to a JSON.

Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.name: failedDeserialization
Enums/PIOError.html#/s:12PredictionIO8PI.abstract: Returned when failing to deserialize a JSON to an object.

Enums/PIOError/InvalidEventReason.html.name: InvalidEventReason
Enums/PIOError/InvalidEventReason.html.abstract: The underlying reason the event is invalid.

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: isSuccess
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: Returns true if the result is a success. Otherwise, returns false.

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: isFailure
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: Returns true if the result is a failure. Otherwise, returns false.

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: value
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: Returns the value if the result is a success. Otherwise, returns nil.

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: error
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: Returns the error if the result is a failure. Otherwise, returns nil.

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: debugDescription
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: A textual representation of this instance, suitable for debugging.

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: map(_:)
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: Evaluates the given closure when this Result is a success, passing the

Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.name: flatMap(_:)
Enums/Result.html#/s:12PredictionIO6Resu.abstract: Evaluates the given closure when this Result is a success, passing the

Enums/Result.html.name: Result
Enums/Result.html.abstract: Used to represent if a request including post-processsing is successful

Enums/PIOError.html.name: PIOError
Enums/PIOError.html.abstract: PIOError is the error type returned by PredictionIO.

Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.name: init(accessKey:baseURL:channel:timout:)
Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.abstract: Creates a client instance to connect to the Event Server.

Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.name: createEvent(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.abstract: Creates an event in the Event Server.

Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.name: createBatchEvents(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.abstract: Creates a batch of events in the Event Server.

Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.name: getEvent(eventID:completionHandler:)
Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.abstract: Retrieves an event from the Event Server.

Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.name: deleteEvent(eventID:completionHandler:)
Classes/EventClient.html#/s:12Prediction.abstract: Deletes an event from the Event Server.

Classes/EngineClient.html#/s:12Predictio.name: init(baseURL:timeout:)
Classes/EngineClient.html#/s:12Predictio.abstract: Creates a client instance to connect to the Engine Server.

Classes/EngineClient.html#/s:12Predictio.name: sendQuery(_:responseType:completionHandler:)
Classes/EngineClient.html#/s:12Predictio.abstract: Queries the prediction engine and parses the response into the given response type.

Classes/EngineClient.html.name: EngineClient
Classes/EngineClient.html.abstract: Responsible for retrieving prediction results from a PredictionIO Engine Server.

Classes/EventClient.html.name: EventClient
Classes/EventClient.html.abstract: Responsible for sending data to a PredictionIO Event Server.
